name: Career Center
description: Project where students can research College vs trade school and other options.

name: Fetch
description: Project for finding pet friendly restaurants, bars, and other public locations.

name: Fetch API
description: This is an ancillary project I wrote for my bootcamp groups Fetch project.  The goal of this was to provide an API for 3rd parties to access, add, and use data from the Fetch website.

name: ScrappyScrappy
description: Hacker News Scrapper. CRUD operations in MongoDB utilizing Mongoose, HandleBars, and Bootstrap.

name: ScheduleMe
description: App to allow friends to schedule hangouts.  Users can vote on a movie or place to go.  This is our first group project from bootcamp.

name: Friend Finder
description: A page to help you find the right dog for you.  Used to learn routes in express.

name: dxfAssy
description: DXF files are used by our nesting software to create g-Code readable by our CNC controllers. This program is to automatically export .dxf files from an Autodesk Inventor Assembly file. Assign the file to the correct table with parameters for each part and each different cutting process/controller. Next, start the nesting software and autonest. iLogic uses Inventor's builtin .NET API.

name: Captain Battle
description: Simple game using only JS and HTML.  The object of the game is to win based on the order you defeat your oponents.

name: Create Sheets
description: Create drawing sheets from Autodesk Inventor assemblies.

name: FireFly Trivia
description: Simple trivia game aimed at learning async calls.

name: Burgers Man
description: Simple page to demostrate handlebars and MySQL
